summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Bothell Way, as laid off an extended by Ordinance No. 39782, from 10th Avenue Northeast to the north margin of East 85th Street; East 75th Street, from 10th Avenue Northeast to 11th Avenue Northeast; East 80th Street, from Brooklyn Avenue to 15th Avenue Northeast; and 15th Avenue Northeast, from East 80th Street to East 82nd Street; all in the City of Seattle; all in accordance with Resolution No. 6370 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
